Uses of Interface
zebra4j.Attribute

  • Packages that use Attribute 
    Package Description
    zebra4j
    zebra4j is a generator and solver for Zebra puzzles, a type of "logic grid puzzles".
    zebra4j.fact
    Definition and implementation of facts.

    • Uses of Attribute in zebra4j
